name: Pixel Penalty (prototype)
description:
This is a prototype for the kicker in my Pixel Penalty game. Development is on hold because I got bored (sorry lol). Hopefully later this year I'll get more motivation and make the full game with the goalie.

CONTROLS (controller only):

RT to adjust power

Left joystick X-axis to aim shot

Right joystick Y-axis to adjust shot height

RB/LT to shoot/kick the ball

LB to reset the game
